name: Time to fly
description:
Description

Human have change.

They destroy, the create.

They are evil, but they are good

Human is chaos and it was on par with the goddess.

You, the god of space, doesn’t like the Idea of human.

It’s better for them to be gone from existence.

And by removing air from the space, you succeed.

But the result of your action almost wipe the goddess from existence too. Guilty and shamed, you asked the god of time to help you fix this mess.

How to play?

Enter - Accept

WASD - to move

Mouse - to control time

How to beat the  boss?

- collect the glowing tiny shine.

-if you're lucky enough, sometimes the shine will spawn inside the boss, so good luck!
